A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan of the original trilogy\, and of the recent creations with Rogue One and the Force Awakens\, I was disappointed in the characters and the story. I was particularly disappointed in Luke and many of the male leads. It appears that there is little to find redeeming with being a guy\, at present\, as we are depicted as being broken\, afraid\, selfish\, filled with rage\, and overly arrogant. Whereas\, the female leads are strong\, wise\, sophisticated and where challenged are depicted in a manner where their true good never is questioned.  I'm just disappointed
